name: Cloud Study Jam
description:
Cloud Study Jam

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform with us!

During the workshops:

*We'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs together, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
*You will learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
*You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Attendees get free access to the labs.
Due to limited space available, attendees need to register on this meetup event. Click that you are coming!
